input: Perform a batch operation to create a prenote entry, then immediately retrieve it by UUID.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /BankAccountPrenoteEntries HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"BankAccountUUID": "77777777-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01", "TypeCode": "50", "Note": "Initial Entry"}

GET /BankAccountPrenoteEntries?$filter=BankAccountUUID eq '77777777-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01' HTTP/1.1

--request-separator--
